snippet: A 10,000-square-foot complex in Toronto Pearson International Airport may be the boldest assertion yet that a full-service fitness operation will get travelers to do more than eat, drink and sit.
abstract: GoodLife Fitness, Canada's largest chain of health clubs, opened in October 2013 what is believed to be the only in-terminal airport gym in North America, in Toronto Pearson International Airport; while travelers, particularly business travelers, are able to fit in a work out while on layovers, gym has fewer patrons that are not airport or airline employees than expected.
lead_paragraph: A 10,000-square-foot complex in Toronto Pearson International Airport may be the boldest assertion yet that a full-service fitness operation will get travelers to do more than eat, drink and sit.

headline.main: Staying Fit Between Flights With No Time to Spare
headline.print_headline: Staying Fit Between Flights With No Time to Spare
